00010 if {[file tail $argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
00011   
00012   set tke_dir [file dirname [file dirname [file normalize $argv0]]]
00013   
00014   package require msgcat
00015   
00016   source [file join $tke_dir utils.tcl]

00020 namespace eval themer {
00021   
00022   variable theme_dir      [file join $::tke_dir data themes]
00023   variable tmtheme        ""
00024   variable write_callback ""
00025    
00026   array set widgets     {}
00027   array set all_scopes  {}
00028   array set orig_labels {}
00029   
00030   array set label_index {
00031     color   0
00032     setable 1
00033     tagpos  2
00034     scope   3
00035   }
00036   
00037   array set scope_map {
00038     comment              comments
00039     keyword              keywords
00040     string               strings
00041     entity               punctuation
00042     punctuation          punctuation
00043     meta.preprocessor.c  precompile
00044     other.preprocessor.c precompile
00045     constant             numbers
00046     constant.numeric     numbers
00047     variable.other       miscellaneous
00048     meta.tag             miscellaneous
00049   }
00050    
00051   array set labels {
00052     background       {""       1 ""            ""}
00053     foreground       {""       1 ""            ""}
00054     warnwidthcolor   {""       0 "-background" ""}
00055     selectbackground {"blue"   0 ""            ""}
00056     selectforeground {"white"  0 ""            ""}
00057     highlightcolor   {"yellow" 0 ""            ""}
00058     cursor           {""       1 "-background" ""}
00059     keywords         {""       1 "-foreground" ""}
00060     comments         {""       1 "-foreground" ""}
00061     strings          {""       1 "-foreground" ""}
00062     numbers          {""       1 "-foreground" ""}
00063     punctuation      {""       1 "-foreground" ""}
00064     precompile       {""       1 "-foreground" ""}
00065     miscellaneous    {""       1 "-foreground" ""}
00066   }
00067   
00068   # Add trace to the labels array
00069   trace variable themer::labels w themer::handle_label_change 
00070   
00071   #############################################################
00072   # Called whenever a menu item is selected inthe scope menu.
00073   proc handle_label_change {name1 lbl op} {
00074   
00075     variable labels
00076     variable label_index
00077     variable widgets
00078     
00079     # If the label is setable by the user, update the buttons and labels
00080     if {[lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(setable)]} {
00081       
00082       # Get the color from the label
00083       set color [lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(color)]
00084        
00085       # Set the button and label
00086       $widgets(l:$lbl) configure -foreground ""
00087       $widgets(b:$lbl) configure -text [lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(scope)]
00088        
00089       # Set the image
00090       if {$lbl eq "background"} {
00091         lset labels(warnwidthcolor) $label_index(color) [create_warn_width_color $color]
00092         foreach {l info} [array get labels] {
00093           if {[lindex $info $label_index(setable)] && ([set color [lindex $info $label_index(color)]] ne "")} {
00094             set_button_image $l $color
00095           }
00096         }
00097       } else {
00098         set_button_image $lbl $color
00099       }
00100     
00101     }
00102   
00103     # Highlight the sample textbox
00104     highlight
00105       
00106 
00107   }
00108    
00109   ######################################################################
00110   # Generates a valid RGB color.
00111   proc normalize_color {color} {
00112    
00113     if {[string index $color 0] eq "#"} {
00114       return [string range $color 0 6]
00115     } else {
00116       return $color
00117     }
00118    
00119   }
00120    
00121   ######################################################################
00122   # Creates the warnwidthcolor color from the given background color
00123   # by darkening (if the HSV value is a lighter color) or lightening
00124   # (if the HSV value is a darker color) the color just a bit.
00125   proc create_warn_width_color {color} {
00126    
00127     # Convert the color to an HSV value
00128     foreach {r g b} [winfo rgb [get_win] $color] {}
00129     set hsv [utils::rgb_to_hsv [expr $r >> 8] [expr $g >> 8] [expr $b >> 8]]
00130    
00131     # Lighten it if value is closer to black
00132     if {[lindex $hsv 2] < 0x80} {
00133       lset hsv 2 [expr [lindex $hsv 2] + 40]
00134    
00135     # Otherwise, darken the color to white
00136     } else {
00137       lset hsv 2 [expr [lindex $hsv 2] - 40]
00138     }
00139    
00140     # Convert the HSV value back to an RGB value
00141     set rgb [utils::hsv_to_rgb {*}$hsv]
00142    
00143     return [eval "format {#%02x%02x%02x} $rgb"]
00144    
00145   }
00146   
00147   ######################################################################
00148   # Sets the image for the type button.
00149   proc set_button_image {lbl color} {
00150     
00151     variable widgets
00152     variable labels
00153     variable label_index
00154     
00155     # Delete the current image
00156     if {[set img [$widgets(b:$lbl) cget -image]] ne ""} {
00157       image delete $img
00158     }
00159     
00160     # Create the image
00161     set img [image create bitmap -file [file join $::tke_dir lib images color.bmp] \
00162                                  -background [lindex $labels(background) $label_index(color)] -foreground $color]
00163     
00164     # Set the image
00165     $widgets(b:$lbl) configure -image $img
00166     
00167   }
00168    
00169   ######################################################################
00170   # Reads the given TextMate theme file and extracts the relevant information
00171   # for tke's needs.
00172   proc read_tmtheme {theme} {
00173     
00174     variable labels
00175     variable scope_map
00176     variable all_scopes
00177     variable tmtheme
00178     variable orig_labels
00179     variable widgets
00180     variable label_index
00181     
00182     set tmtheme $theme
00183     
00184     if {![catch { open $theme r } rc]} {
00185       
00186       # Read the contents of the file into 'content' and close the file
00187       set content [string map {\n { }} [read $rc]]
00188       close $rc
00189       
00190       array set depth {
00191         plist  0
00192         array  0
00193         dict   0
00194         key    0
00195         string 0
00196       }
00197       
00198       set scope       0
00199       set foreground  0
00200       set background  0
00201       set caret       0
00202       set scope_types ""
00203       
00204       while {[regexp {\s*([^<]*)\s*<(/?\w+)[^>]*>(.*)$} $content -> value element content]} {
00205         if {[string index $element 0] eq "/"} {
00206           set element [string range $element 1 end]
00207           switch $element {
00208             key {
00209               switch $value {
00210                 scope      { set scope      1 }
00211                 foreground { set foreground 1 }
00212                 background { set background 1 }
00213                 caret      { set caret      1 }
00214               }
00215             }
00216             string {
00217               if {$scope} {
00218                 set scope       0
00219                 set scope_types $value
00220               } elseif {$foreground} {
00221                 set foreground 0
00222                 set color      [normalize_color $value]
00223                 if {$scope_types eq ""} {
00224                   lset labels(foreground) $label_index(color) $color
00225                   lset labels(foreground) $label_index(scope) "foreground"
00226                   set all_scopes(foreground) $color
00227                 } else {
00228                   foreach scope_type [string map {, { }} $scope_types] {
00229                     if {[info exists scope_map($scope_type)]} {
00230                       set lbl $scope_map($scope_type)
00231                       lset labels($lbl) $label_index(color) $color
00232                       lset labels($lbl) $label_index(scope) $scope_type
00233                     }
00234                     set all_scopes($scope_type) $color
00235                   }
00236                 }
00237               } elseif {$background} {
00238                 set background 0
00239                 set color      [normalize_color $value]
00240                 if {$scope_types eq ""} {
00241                   lset labels(background)     $label_index(color) $color
00242                   lset labels(background)     $label_index(scope) "background"
00243                   lset labels(warnwidthcolor) $label_index(color) [create_warn_width_color $color]
00244                   set all_scopes(background) $color
00245                 }
00246               } elseif {$caret} {
00247                 set caret 0
00248                 set color [normalize_color $value]
00249                 if {$scope_types eq ""} {
00250                   lset labels(cursor) $label_index(color) $color
00251                   lset labels(cursor) $label_index(scope) "cursor"
00252                   set all_scopes(cursor) $color
00253                 }
00254               }
00255             }
00256           }
00257           incr depth($element) -1
00258         } else {
00259           incr depth($element)
00260         }
00261       }
00262       
00263     } elseif {[file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
00264       
00265       puts [msgcat::mc "ERROR:  Unable to read %s" $theme]
00266       puts $rc
00267       exit 1
00268       
00269     }
00270     
00271     # Save the labels array to orig_labels
00272     array set orig_labels [array get labels]
00273     
00274   }
00275   
00276   ######################################################################
00277   # Reads the contents of the tketheme and stores the results 
00278   proc read_tketheme {theme} {
00279     
00280     variable labels
00281     variable label_index
00282     
00283     if {![catch { open $theme r } rc]} {
00284       
00285       # Read the contents from the file and close
00286       array set contents [read $rc]
00287       close $rc
00288       
00289       # Store the contents into the labels array
00290       foreach {lbl info} [array get labels] {
00291         if {[info exists contents($lbl)]} {
00292           lset labels($lbl) $label_index(color) $contents($lbl)
00293         }
00294       }
00295       
00296     } elseif {[file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
00297       
00298       puts [msgcat::mc "ERROR:  Unable to read %s" $theme]
00299       puts $rc
00300       exit 1
00301       
00302     }
00303     
00304   }
00305    
00306   ######################################################################
00307   # Displays a window showing all of the current themes.
00308   proc get_theme {} {
00309     
00310     # Initialize variables
00311     set w            ".thrwin"
00312     set ::theme_name ""
00313     
00314     # Create the window
00315     toplevel     $w
00316     wm title     $w [msgcat::mc "Select theme"]
00317     wm transient $w .
00318     wm resizable $w 0 0
00319     
00320     ttk::frame     $w.tf
00321     listbox        $w.tf.lb -height 8 -selectmode "single" -yscrollcommand "$w.tf.vb set"
00322     ttk::scrollbar $w.tf.vb -orient vertical -command "$w.tf.lb yview"
00323     
00324     grid rowconfigure    $w.tf 0 -weight 1
00325     grid columnconfigure $w.tf 0 -weight 1
00326     grid $w.tf.lb -row 0 -column 0 -sticky news
00327     grid $w.tf.vb -row 0 -column 1 -sticky ns
00328     
00329     # Figure out the width of the buttons
00330     set bwidth [msgcat::mcmax "OK" "Cancel"]
00331     
00332     ttk::frame  $w.bf
00333     ttk::button $w.bf.ok -text [msgcat::mc "OK"] -width $bwidth -command {
00334       set ::theme_name [.thrwin.tf.lb get [.thrwin.tf.lb curselection]]
00335       destroy .thrwin
00336     }
00337     ttk::button $w.bf.cancel -text [msgcat::mc "Cancel"] -width $bwidth -command {
00338       destroy .thrwin
00339     }
00340     
00341     pack $w.bf.cancel -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00342     pack $w.bf.ok     -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00343     
00344     pack $w.tf -fill x
00345     pack $w.bf -fill x
00346     
00347     bind $w.tf.lb <Return> {
00348       set ::theme_name [.thrwin.tf.lb get [.thrwin.tf.lb curselection]]
00349       destroy .thrwin
00350     }
00351     bind $w.tf.lb <Double-Button-1> {
00352       set ::theme_name [.thrwin.tf.lb get [.thrwin.tf.lb curselection]]
00353       destroy .thrwin
00354     }
00355     
00356     # Get the theme names
00357     foreach theme [lsort [glob -tails -directory [file join $::tke_dir data themes] *.tketheme]] {
00358       $w.tf.lb insert end $theme
00359     }
00360     $w.tf.lb selection set 0
00361 
00362     # Center the window and grab the focus
00363     ::tk::PlaceWindow $w widget .
00364     ::tk::SetFocusGrab $w $w
00365     
00366     # Put the focus on the listbox
00367     focus $w.tf.lb
00368     
00369     # Wait for the window to be closed
00370     tkwait window $w
00371     
00372     # Release the grab/focus
00373     ::tk::RestoreFocusGrab $w $w
00374     
00375     if {$::theme_name ne ""} {
00376       return [file join $::tke_dir data themes $::theme_name]
00377     } else {
00378       return ""
00379     }
00380     
00381   }

00383   ######################################################################
00384   # Displays a window that gets the name of a theme file.
00385   proc get_save_name {} {
00386     
00387     # Initialize variables
00388     set w            "[get_path].swin"
00389     set ::theme_name ""
00390     
00391     # Create the window
00392     toplevel     $w
00393     wm title     $w [msgcat::mc "Enter theme name"]
00394     wm transient $w [get_win]
00395     wm resizable $w 0 0
00396     
00397     ttk::frame $w.tf
00398     ttk::label $w.tf.l -text [msgcat::mc "Name:"]
00399     ttk::entry $w.tf.e -validate key -invalidcommand bell -validatecommand {
00400       [themer::get_path].swin.bf.ok configure \
00401         -state [expr {([string length %P] eq "") ? "disabled" : "normal"}]
00402       return 1
00403     }
00404     
00405     pack $w.tf.l -side left -padx 2 -pady 2
00406     pack $w.tf.e -side left -fill x -padx 2 -pady 2
00407     
00408     set bwidth [msgcat::mcmax "OK" "Cancel"]
00409     
00410     ttk::frame  $w.bf
00411     ttk::button $w.bf.ok -text [msgcat::mc "OK"] -width $bwidth -state disabled -command {
00412       set top          [themer::get_path]
00413       set ::theme_name [$top.swin.tf.e get]
00414       destroy $top.swin
00415     }
00416     ttk::button $w.bf.cancel -text [msgcat::mc "Cancel"] -width $bwidth -command {
00417       destroy [themer::get_path].swin
00418     }
00419     
00420     pack $w.bf.cancel -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00421     pack $w.bf.ok     -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00422     
00423     pack $w.tf -fill x
00424     pack $w.bf -fill x
00425     
00426     bind $w.tf.e <Return> {
00427       set top [themer::get_path]
00428       if {[set ::theme_name [$top.swin.tf.e get]] ne ""} {
00429         destroy $top.swin
00430       }
00431     }
00432     
00433     # Center the window and grab the focus
00434     ::tk::PlaceWindow $w widget [get_win]
00435     ::tk::SetFocusGrab $w $w
00436     
00437     # Focus on the entry
00438     focus $w.tf.e
00439     
00440     # Wait for the window to be closed
00441     tkwait window $w
00442     
00443     # Release the grab/focus
00444     ::tk::RestoreFocusGrab $w $w
00445     
00446     if {$::theme_name ne ""} {
00447       return "[file tail [file rootname $::theme_name]].tketheme"
00448     } else {
00449       return ""
00450     }
00451     
00452   }
00453    
00454   ######################################################################
00455   # Writes the TKE theme file to the theme directory.
00456   proc write_tketheme {} {
00457     
00458     variable theme_dir
00459     variable tmtheme
00460     variable labels
00461     variable label_index
00462     variable write_callback
00463     
00464     # If we don't have a theme name, get one
00465     if {$tmtheme eq ""} {
00466       if {[set tmtheme [get_save_name]] eq ""} {
00467         return 0
00468       }
00469     }
00470     
00471     # Get the basename of the tmtheme file
00472     set basename [file rootname [file tail $tmtheme]]
00473     
00474     if {![catch { open [file join $theme_dir $basename.tketheme] w } rc]} {
00475       
00476       foreach {lbl info} [array get labels] {
00477         puts $rc [format "%-16s \"%s\"" $lbl [string tolower [lindex $info $label_index(color)]]]
00478       }
00479       
00480       close $rc
00481       
00482       # If we have a write callback routine, call it now
00483       if {$write_callback ne ""} {
00484         uplevel #0 $write_callback
00485       }
00486       
00487     } elseif {[file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
00488       
00489       puts [msgcat::mc "ERROR:  Unable to write %s" [file join $theme_dir $basename.tketheme]]
00490       puts $rc
00491       exit 1
00492       
00493     }
00494     
00495     return 1
00496     
00497   }
00498   
00499   ######################################################################
00500   # Creates the UI for the importer, automatically populating it with
00501   # the default values.
00502   proc create {{callback ""}} {
00503     
00504     variable widgets
00505     variable labels
00506     variable label_index
00507     variable all_scopes
00508     variable tmtheme
00509     variable write_callback
00510     
00511     # Set the write callback proc
00512     set write_callback $callback
00513     
00514     # Make it so that the window cannot be resized
00515     if {[file tail $::argv0] ne "themer.tcl"} {
00516       toplevel [get_win]
00517       wm transient [get_win] .
00518     }
00519     wm resizable [get_win] 0 0
00520     
00521     # Create top frame
00522     ttk::frame [get_path].tf
00523     
00524     # Create top-left frame
00525     ttk::frame [get_path].tf.lf
00526     
00527     incr i
00528     foreach lbl [lsort [array names labels]] {
00529       
00530       if {[lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(setable)]} {
00531       
00532         # Create the label and menubutton
00533         set widgets(l:$lbl) [ttk::label [get_path].tf.lf.l$lbl -text "[string totitle $lbl]:"]
00534         set widgets(b:$lbl) [ttk::label [get_path].tf.lf.b$lbl -anchor w -relief raised]
00535         
00536         bind $widgets(b:$lbl) <Button-1> "themer::show_menu $lbl"
00537       
00538         # Create menu
00539         set widgets(m:$lbl) [menu [get_path].tf.lf.b$lbl.mnu -tearoff 0]
00540         
00541         # Add custom command so that we don't get an error when parsing
00542         $widgets(m:$lbl) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Create custom"]
00543       
00544         # Add them to the grid
00545         grid $widgets(l:$lbl) -row $i -column 0 -sticky news -padx 2 -pady 2
00546         grid $widgets(b:$lbl) -row $i -column 1 -sticky news -padx 2 -pady 2
00547       
00548         incr i
00549         
00550       }
00551       
00552     }
00553     
00554     # Create the top-right frame
00555     ttk::labelframe [get_path].tf.rf -text "Sample Text"
00556     set widgets(txt) [text [get_path].tf.rf.txt -height 10 -width 40]
00557     
00558     $widgets(txt) insert end "#ifdef DFN\n"
00559     $widgets(txt) insert end "\n"
00560     $widgets(txt) insert end "  // Some sort of comment\n"
00561     $widgets(txt) insert end "  void foobar () {\n"
00562     $widgets(txt) insert end "    int a = 100;\n"
00563     $widgets(txt) insert end "    printf( \"a: %d\\n\", a );\n"
00564     $widgets(txt) insert end "  }\n"
00565     $widgets(txt) insert end "\n"
00566     $widgets(txt) insert end "#endif\n"
00567     
00568     # Tag the text widget
00569     $widgets(txt) tag add precompile     1.0 1.10 9.0 9.6
00570     $widgets(txt) tag add comments       3.2 3.25
00571     $widgets(txt) tag add keywords       4.2 4.6 5.4 5.7 6.4 6.10
00572     $widgets(txt) tag add numbers        5.12 5.15
00573     $widgets(txt) tag add strings        6.12 6.21
00574     $widgets(txt) tag add miscellaneous  6.4 6.10
00575     $widgets(txt) tag add punctuation    4.14 4.19 5.10 5.11 5.15 5.16 6.10 6.11 6.21 6.22 6.26 6.28
00576     $widgets(txt) tag add warnwidthcolor 6.25 6.28
00577     $widgets(txt) tag add cursor         4.2 4.3
00578     
00579     # Disable the text widget
00580     $widgets(txt) configure -state disabled
00581 
00582     pack $widgets(txt) -fill both -expand yes
00583 
00584     grid [get_path].tf.lf -row 0 -column 0 -sticky news -padx 2 -pady 2
00585     grid [get_path].tf.rf -row 0 -column 1 -sticky news -padx 2 -pady 2
00586     
00587     set bwidth [msgcat::mcmax "Reset" "Save As" "Import" "Create" "Save" "Cancel"]
00588     
00589     # Create the button frame
00590     ttk::frame  [get_path].bf
00591     set widgets(reset) [ttk::button [get_path].bf.reset  -text [msgcat::mc "Reset"] -width $bwidth -command {
00592       array set themer::labels [array get themer::orig_labels]
00593       themer::highlight
00594     }]
00595     set widgets(saveas) [ttk::button [get_path].bf.saveas -text [msgcat::mc "Save As"] -width $bwidth -command {
00596       set orig_tmtheme    $themer::tmtheme
00597       set themer::tmtheme ""
00598       if {[themer::write_tketheme]} {
00599         destroy [themer::get_win]
00600       } else {
00601         set themer::tmtheme $orig_tmtheme
00602       }
00603     }]
00604     set widgets(action) [ttk::button [get_path].bf.import -text [msgcat::mc "Import"] -width $bwidth -command {
00605       if {[themer::write_tketheme]} {
00606         destroy [themer::get_win]
00607       }
00608     }]
00609     ttk::button [get_path].bf.cancel -text [msgcat::mc "Cancel"] -width $bwidth -command {
00610       destroy [themer::get_win]
00611     }
00612     
00613     if {$tmtheme ne ""} {
00614       pack [get_path].bf.reset  -side left  -padx 2 -pady 2
00615     }
00616     
00617     pack [get_path].bf.cancel -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00618     pack [get_path].bf.import -side right -padx 2 -pady 2
00619     
00620     pack [get_path].tf -fill both -expand yes
00621     pack [get_path].bf -fill x
00622       
00623     # If the window is coming from tke, center it in the window
00624     if {[file tail $::argv0] ne "themer.tcl"} {
00625       ::tk::PlaceWindow [get_win] widget .
00626     }
00627     
00628   }
00629   
00630   ######################################################################
00631   # Displays the menu for the given color type.
00632   proc show_menu {lbl} {
00633     
00634     variable widgets
00635     variable tmtheme
00636     
00637     # If we are dealing with a theme, display the menu
00638     if {$tmtheme ne ""} {
00639     
00640       tk_popup $widgets(m:$lbl) \
00641         [winfo rootx $widgets(b:$lbl)] \
00642         [expr [winfo rooty $widgets(b:$lbl)] + [winfo reqheight $widgets(b:$lbl)]]
00643       
00644     # Otherwise, if we are creating a new, just launch the color chooser
00645     } else {
00646       
00647       create_custom_color $lbl
00648         
00649     }
00650     
00651   }
00652   
00653   #############################################################
00654   # Called whenever a menu item is selected inthe scope menu.
00655   proc handle_menu_select {lbl scope} {
00656   
00657     variable labels
00658     variable label_index
00659     variable all_scopes
00660     
00661     # Set the current color to the given scope
00662     lset labels($lbl) $label_index(color) $all_scopes($scope)
00663     lset labels($lbl) $label_index(scope) $scope
00664  
00665   }
00666   
00667   ######################################################################
00668   # Allows the user to create a custom color.
00669   proc create_custom_color {lbl} {
00670     
00671     variable labels
00672     variable label_index
00673     
00674     # Set the color to the chosen color
00675     if {[set color [tk_chooseColor -initialcolor [lindex $labels($lbl) $label_index(color)] -parent [get_win] -title "Choose custom color"]] ne ""} {
00676       lset labels($lbl) $label_index(color) $color
00677     }
00678     
00679   }
00680  
00681   ######################################################################
00682   # Perform the highlight on the text widget based on the current labels.
00683   proc highlight {} {
00684     
00685     variable widgets
00686     variable labels
00687     variable label_index
00688     variable all_scopes
00689     variable tmtheme
00690     
00691     # Colorize all of the foreground tags and the menu
00692     foreach {lbl info} [array get labels] {
00693       if {[set pos [lindex $info $label_index(tagpos)]] ne ""} {
00694         $widgets(txt) tag configure $lbl $pos [lindex $info $label_index(color)]
00695       }
00696     }
00697     
00698     # Colorize the text widget itself
00699     if {[set color [lindex $labels(foreground) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00700       $widgets(txt) configure -foreground $color
00701     }
00702     if {[set color [lindex $labels(background) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00703       $widgets(txt) configure -background $color
00704     }
00705     
00706     # Colorize the menubuttons and menus
00707     if {$tmtheme ne ""} {
00708       foreach {lbl info} [array get labels] {
00709         if {[lindex $info $label_index(setable)]} {
00710           set mnu $widgets(m:$lbl)
00711           if {[set color [lindex $labels(background) $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00712             $mnu configure -background $color
00713           }
00714           if {[set color [lindex $info $label_index(color)]] ne ""} {
00715             $mnu entryconfigure [msgcat::mc "Create custom"] -foreground $color
00716           }
00717           foreach scope [array names all_scopes] {
00718             catch { $mnu entryconfigure $scope -foreground $all_scopes($scope) }
00719           }
00720         }
00721       }
00722     }
00723 
00724   }
00725   
00726   ######################################################################
00727   # Returns the name of the top-level window.
00728   proc get_win {} {
00729     
00730     return [expr {([file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl") ? "." : ".thwin"}]
00731 
00732   }
00733   
00734   ######################################################################
00735   # Returns the path of the top-level window.
00736   proc get_path {} {
00737     
00738     return [expr {([file tail $::argv0] eq "themer.tcl") ? "" : ".thwin"}]
00739     
00740   }
00741   
00742   ######################################################################
00743   # Imports the given TextMate theme and displays the result in the UI.
00744   proc import_tm {theme {callback ""}} {
00745   
00746     variable widgets
00747     variable tmtheme
00748     variable all_scopes
00749     
00750     # Set the theme
00751     set tmtheme $theme
00752     
00753     # Create the UI
00754     create $callback
00755     
00756     # Initialize the widgets
00757     wm title [get_win] [msgcat::mc "Import TextMate Theme"]
00758     $widgets(action) configure -text [msgcat::mc "Import"]
00759     catch { pack $widgets(reset) -side left -padx 2 -pady 2 }
00760     
00761     # Set the label colors to red
00762     foreach l [array names widgets l:*] {
00763       $widgets($l) configure -foreground "red"
00764       $widgets(b:[lindex [split $l :] 1]) configure -compound left
00765     }
00766     
00767     # Read the theme
00768     read_tmtheme $theme
00769     
00770     # Update the menus
00771     foreach mnu [array names widgets m:*] {
00772       
00773       set lbl [lindex [split $mnu :] 1]
00774       
00775       # Clear the menu
00776       $widgets($mnu) delete 0 end
00777       
00778       # Add the custom menu
00779       $widgets($mnu) add command -label [msgcat::mc "Create custom"] -command "themer::create_custom_color $lbl"
00780       $widgets($mnu) add separator
00781     
00782       # Add the scopes to the menu
00783       set i 2
00784       foreach scope [lsort [array names all_scopes]] {
00785         $widgets($mnu) add command -label $scope -columnbreak [expr ($i % 40) == 39] \
00786           -command "themer::handle_menu_select $lbl $scope"
00787         incr i
00788       }
00789       
00790     }
00791     
00792   }
00793   
00794   ######################################################################
00795   # Imports the given tke theme and displays the result in the UI.
00796   proc import_tke {theme {callback ""}} {
00797     
00798     variable widgets
00799     variable tmtheme
00800     variable all_scopes
00801     
00802     # Set the theme
00803     set tmtheme $theme
00804     
00805     # Create the UI
00806     create $callback
00807     
00808     # Initialize UI
00809     wm title [get_win] [msgcat::mc "Edit theme"]
00810     $widgets(action) configure -text [msgcat::mc "Save"]
00811     catch { pack $widgets(reset) -side left -padx 2 -pady 2 }
00812     catch { pack $widgets(saveas) -side right -padx 2 -pady 2 }
00813     
00814     # Read the theme
00815     read_tketheme $theme
00816     
00817   }
00818   
00819   ######################################################################
00820   # Allows the user to create a new theme.
00821   proc create_new {{callback ""}} {
00822     
00823     variable labels
00824     variable widgets
00825     variable tmtheme
00826     variable label_index
00827     
00828     # Clear the theme
00829     set tmtheme ""
00830     
00831     # Create the UI
00832     create $callback
00833     
00834     # Initialize the widgets
00835     wm title [get_win] [msgcat::mc "Create New Theme"]
00836     $widgets(action) configure -text [msgcat::mc "Create"]
00837     catch { pack forget $widgets(reset) }
00838     
00839     # Initialize the labels array
00840     lset labels(background)       $label_index(color) "black"
00841     lset labels(foreground)       $label_index(color) "white"
00842     lset labels(selectbackground) $label_index(color) "blue"
00843     lset labels(selectforeground) $label_index(color) "white"
00844     lset labels(highlightcolor)   $label_index(color) "yellow"
00845     lset labels(cursor)           $label_index(color) "grey"
00846     lset labels(keywords)         $label_index(color) "red"
00847     lset labels(comments)         $label_index(color) "blue"
00848     lset labels(strings)          $label_index(color) "green"
00849     lset labels(numbers)          $label_index(color) "orange"
00850     lset labels(punctuation)      $label_index(color) "white"
00851     lset labels(precompile)       $label_index(color) "yellow"
00852     lset labels(miscellaneous)    $label_index(color) "pink"
00853     lset labels(warnwidthcolor)   $label_index(color) [create_warn_width_color "black"]
00854 
00855   }
00856 
00857 }
00858 
00859 if {[file tail $argv0] eq "themer.tcl"} {
00860 
00861   ######################################################################
00862   # Displays usage message if this script is being executed from the
00863   # command-line.
00864   proc usage {} {
00865   
00866     puts "Usage:  themer (-h | <tmTheme file> | <tkeTheme file>)"
00867     puts ""
00868     puts "Options:"
00869     puts "  -h  Displays this help information"
00870     puts ""
00871   
00872     exit
00873   
00874   }
00875 
00876   # Parse the command-line options
00877   set i 0
00878   while {$i < $argc} {
00879     switch [lindex $argv $i] {
00880       -h      { usage }
00881       default { set theme [lindex $argv $i] }
00882     }
00883     incr i
00884   }
00885 
00886   # Set the theme to clam
00887   ttk::style theme use clam
00888 
00889   if {[info exists theme]} {
00890     set ext [string tolower [file extension $theme]]
00891     switch -exact -- $ext {
00892       .tmtheme  { themer::import_tm $theme }
00893       .tketheme { themer::import_tke $theme }
00894       default   {
00895         puts [msgcat::mc "Error:  Theme is not a supported theme"]
00896         usage
00897       }
00898     }
00899   } else {
00900     themer::create_new
00901   }
00902   
00903 }
